CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;Remainder inadmissible;Pecuniary damage - claim dismissed;Non-pecuniary damage - award
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Elisabeth Steiner;George Nicolaou;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , LOC .
CARDINAL . The applicant sued ORG and ORG for medical negligence in respect of her minor son .
CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG of LOC awarded the applicant MONEY ( RUB ) of nonpecuniary damages and RUB CARDINAL for the court fee against ORG and dismissed the claims against ORG as unfounded .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal . The award remained unenforced .

CARDINAL . On DATE , upon ORG request , the Presidium of ORG quashed by way of supervisory review the judgment of DATE , as upheld on DATE , in the part related to the award made in favour of the applicant , because the lower courts incorrectly assessed the facts of the case . The court remitted the case in that part for a fresh examination in the first instance and upheld the remainder of the lower courts ' findings .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant lodged a request for annulment of the judgment of DATE in the part concerning ORG liability on account of discovery of the new circumstances , i.e. evidence of ORG liability .

CARDINAL . On DATE the ORG allowed her request , annulled the judgment of DATE as amended by the ruling of CARDINAL DATE in the part concerning the rejection of the applicant 's claims against ORG and reopened the case .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG partially granted the applicant 's claims against both defendants and awarded her RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL to be paid by ORG and RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL to be paid by ORG in non - pecuniary damages .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment on appeal and it acquired legal force .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG and on DATE and DATE ORG each paid the non - pecuniary damages to the applicant in the amounts specified by the domestic court .

CARDINAL . The judgment debt in the amount of RUB CARDINAL awarded for the court fee on DATE , has not been enforced . According to the Government , since DATE the authorities have made numerous attempts to contact the applicant and pay the awarded sum , but the applicant has not provided her banking details .
